extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is affected by checking the model and version of the Cisco router.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which Cisco router model is affected?

extracted_playbook.title: Await Software Fixes for RV160 and RV260 Series
extracted_playbook.description: Cisco is working on fixes for the RV160 and RV260 Series Routers. Monitor Cisco's updates for the release of these fixes.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade RV340 and RV345 Series Routers
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest software updates released by Cisco to address the vulnerabilities in RV340 and RV345 Series Routers.

affected_products: RV340 Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers
RV340W Dual WAN Gigabit Wireless-AC VPN Routers
RV345 Dual WAN Gigabit VPN Routers
RV345P Dual WAN Gigabit POE VPN Routers
